ComicInfo.Title: Fit the Second: Enter the Gryphon
ComicInfo.Summary: Roger Langridge — the Harvey Award winner behind THE MUPPET SHOW and THOR: THE MIGHTY AVENGER — continues his all new side-splitting adventure that can only be explained as…SNARKED! Journey with Langridge as he pulls the carpet out from under such Lewis Carroll classics as The Walrus and The Carpenter, Through the Looking Glass, and The Hunting of the Snark, creating an all new world of humorous grandeur. Join Princess Scarlett as she, her baby brother Rusty, and the Walrus and the Carpenter outwit the villainous royal advisors to save the Kingdom and set sail in search of the missing Red King. It’s a rip-roaring issue that you won’t want to miss!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:21:38. [CVDB301040]
ComicInfo.Characters: Clyde McDunk, Count Osbert, Gryphon, Lord Kazmar, Mad Hatter, Madame Hecate, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, Tweedledee, Tweedledum, White Knight, Wilburforce J. Walrus
